description.en: Raiga, Sho, and Mio are brothers and sisters who grow up on an isolated island in the distant sea. Raiga has grown into a liger, Shou has grown into an eagle, and Mio has grown into a beast warrior called a mermaid. Zora, the emperor of Zorapagos Island, is the father of three, Dr. Ikushima, who was caught in a madness that created beast warriors. The three of them meet and confront Emperor Zora and his subordinate Pados to save his mother who escaped. What will happen to the confrontation between father and son? In addition, in "The Mystery of Atlantis", Wynn and other students went to Atlantis Island, which houses gold and silver treasures, to save Professor Yang, who went missing. However, it was ruled by the evil emperor Xavira. In the "Super Pit Hole", Harry searched for a large diamond, and his niece Rhonda and his cat Quick Claw, who were kidnapped in an underground labyrinth. The country of Earth Mural was attacked by a corps of demonic beasts. The hero Thor Roa heads to rescue the fairies Popo and Pipi, and has a decisive battle with Dragola.
